projects.name: Resume Builder
description: Creating a resume is a process people struggle with. Formatting and writing relevant details properly is often found to be hard.
An online resume builder could help people by providing premade templates and giving tips on how to improve their resume as they write it.
features: User-friendly interface to create a resume
technologies: Authentication: JWT access tokens stored in cookies

projects.name: Proteus Introduction Site
description: My rowing association, Proteus, has an introduction site for potential new members. It had to be updated to be more informative.
Created a responsive web app with much content such as videos in a committee with other programmers and designers.

projects.name: LiReddit
description: To learn many frontend and backend technologies at once, I followed a tutorial by Ben Awad and extended it with new features.
technologies: Back-end: Node.js, TypeORM, GraphQL, TypeGraphQL, Redis

projects.name: Stack Overflow Survey Visualization
description: In this project, I worked together with two classmates to visualize how certain factors impact developer prosperity. We visualized data from the Stack Overflow Developer Survey of 2020 for the course Data Visualization.
features: Histograms and violin plots with overlay
